thread.section_title: Express Medical Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express Medical Supply | www.exmed.net
thread.title: Cecelia Crew
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by Cecelia Crew

author: Cecelia Crew
title: Cecelia Crew
text: In the town where I live we only have one medical supply store, and where it helps with those who need occasional help, my husband needs full time help, and the medical supplies he needed were unavailable or backordered. Very inconvenient until I found Express Medical. Not only did I save about 80% , they had exactly the supplies I needed.
